articles.content: When it comes to using brownface in movies, "they don't even think there's a problem," said film director Ghaywan. "That's the biggest problem."Top image caption: Left, Actress Bhumi Pednekar at an event in Mumbai on January 16, 2020. Right, the actress in th… [+79 chars]

articles.title: Georgia lawmakers are pushing for a hate crime law after Ahmaud Arbery shooting
articles.description: Georgia is one of four states in the US that does not have hate crime laws or require data collection on hate crimes.
articles.content:
(CNN)Georgia lawmakers are calling for amendments to the state code to include hate crimes after the shooting death of Ahmaud Arbery, who was killed while jogging through a neighborhood.

articles.title: The coronavirus pandemic is hitting black and brown Americans especially hard on all fronts
articles.description: Covid-19 has only magnified the systemic inequalities that persist in the United States. And nonwhite people, especially African-Americans, have been disproportionately affected.
articles.content:
(CNN)At first, the coronavirus pandemic was called the great equalizer.
It seemed to be affecting people of all races, backgrounds and income levels, from Hollywood actors to NBA players to low-wage service workers.

articles.title: The week in 12 headlines
articles.description: This week, President Donald Trump ventured out of Washington for a mostly mask-free visit to an Arizona mask producer. Meanwhile, the White House saw two confirmed coronavirus cases.

articles.title: Televangelist Jim Bakker is recovering from a stroke, his wife says
articles.description: Famed televangelist Jim Bakker recently had a stroke, his wife said. His eponymous TV show will continue to film without him while he recovers.

articles.content:
Today, I run for a man I don't know. Today, I run for a situation that I cannot understand. Today, I run for racial injustice that hurts my heart and angers my soul. 
Today, #IrunwithMaud. Every day I will continue to run for those who can't. pic.twitter.com… [+59 chars]

articles.title: Haiti faces hunger as Covid-19 looms
